SEARCH
Package org.opt4j.core.common.random

Class Rand

java.lang.Object
java.util.Random
org.opt4j.core.common.random.Rand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, RandomGenerator
Direct Known Subclasses:
RandomJava, RandomMersenneTwister
public abstract class Rand extends Random
The Rand class is an abstract class that is utilized as an interface for random classes.
